profile.title: Profile
profile.name: Amane Inoue
profile.occupation: Software engineer from Gunma Prefecture, currently working at a startup in Tokyo.
profile.story: In the summer of 2023, I participated in La Tomatina (tomato festival) in Spain with a friend. That experience and the mindset of 'Let's try anything!' led me to decide to participate in the Marathon des Sables, running 250km across the Sahara Desert in 7 days.
profile.motivation: Despite having little experience in long-distance running, I am determined to complete the race and am preparing thoroughly. With the support from our crowdfunding campaign and everyone's encouragement, I am steadily training day by day.

project.title: Project
project.description: In March 2024, I decided to take on the challenge of the Marathon des Sables, known as the 'world's toughest race,' without any prior marathon experience. With support from many people, I am preparing for a year to complete the race in April 2025. Due to the seemingly reckless nature and extreme difficulty of this challenge, we named this project 'Sahara Sabaka'.

about.title: What is Marathon des Sables?
about.description1: Marathon des Sables THE LEGENDARY, commonly known as the Sahara Marathon, is the world's most challenging marathon event held since 1986. Set in Morocco's Sahara Desert, participants spend 9 out of 11 days in the desert, completing approximately 250km divided into 6 stages.
about.description2: Participants must carry all their equipment and food, with only water provided by the organizers. They navigate through the scorching desert using checkpoints placed approximately every 10km.
